name: Fuzzy Flip - Matching Game
description:
Tap and match or merge on the multi-hued cubes and create amazing color combinations to reach the next gorgeous level awaiting to be solved.
Enjoy a huge variety of puzzle modes and challenges, all with simple tap controls. Travel the map full of exciting matching puzzles levels and enjoy colorful and cute Fuzzies' adventure.


Simple, but fun and challenging tile matching game-play will keep you entertained for hours and hours. There’s always something new to discover in Fuzzy Flip. After all every Fuzzy’s motto is, “The more, the merrier!”


  • MATCHING and MERGING TILES: If you enjoy Match-3 games, puzzles, brain-teasers and adventure, then hurry up and join Fuzzies on their quest!
  • MULTIPLE LEVELS: Over 150 fun-packed brain-teasers provide many hours of puzzle-packed challenge and enjoyment. Exciting discovery every step of the way!
  • BUILD SUPER COMBO’S: Use strategy to combine Fuzzies and build super combinations to receive amazing results and rewards!
  • BEAUTIFUL STYLE: Gorgeous, colorful puzzle levels within this magical Fuzzy fairy-tale.
  • BOOST YOUR FUZZY-POWER: Use powerful spells to boost your results when needed!
  • IMPROVE YOUR BRAIN: Sharpen your cognitive skills and have fun doing it!
  • NO PRESSURE, TAKE YOUR TIME: There’s no time limit. Take as many goes and as much time as you want to complete each fun-packed challenge!
